title: my forums account

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So today i visit the forums, haven't been here in awhile and realized im not allowed to upvote or downvote comments. when visiting my profile i noticed it says im level 29 which i havent been 29 for a very very long time. this account is pretty old and i would like to use it properly, can this be sorted please?

replies.body: can close, i found the tool
Nice job finding that syncing tool before I got here! Also know that simply posting or commenting here in H&S will get the job done too!
